bill_title: to prohibit the contributions of political action committees to certain candidates.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to prohibit the contributions of political action committees to certain candidates. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 12-25 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No political action committee may contribute to any candidate for state office or to any candidate's committee established to secure the nomination or election of a person to a state office. A violation of this section is a Class 2 misdemeanor. Section 2. That chapter 12-25 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No political action committee may contribute to any candidate for legislative office or to any candidate's committee established to secure the nomination or election of a person to a legislative office. A violation of this section is a Class 2 misdemeanor. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
